      • hasOverflowed

        public boolean hasOverflowed()
        Checks whether any of the size-sensitive constant pools have overflowed. This checks whether the type, method, field pools are larger than 64k entries. Note that even if this returns true, it may still be possible to successfully write the dex file, if the overflowed items are not referenced anywhere that uses a 16-bit index
        Returns:
        true if any of the size-sensitive constant pools have overflowed
